title: WHO'S LYING?  The search for 4-year-old Maleah Davis INTENSIFIES!
itunes:title: WHO'S LYING?  The search for 4-year-old Maleah Davis INTENSIFIES!
description:
Since beautiful 4-year-old Maleah Davis went missing some three weeks ago, the mystery has taken a number of twists and turns. As the search for the little girl continues, the father of the main suspect is speaking out, and he appears to be pinning her disappearance on Maleah's mother.

Nancy interviews Tim Miller, the founder and director of Texas Equusearch, who has been heavily involved in the case from the start.

Nancy's expert panel also weighs In:

John Cardillo:  Former NYPD

Dr. Brian Russell:   Psychologist and lawyer

Kathleen Murphy:  Family Attorney

Leigh Egan:  Crime Online Investigative Reporter



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
